These are the perfect comfy lounge around the house shorts or dressed up a bit for a cute summer outfit. Recommend sizing up for a looser and more comfortable fit.  Only reason I gave 4 stars was because they started to pill after several washes. Not super noticeable.
I loved the way that fits
These shorts are comfortable and great for indoor and outdoor
Very happy with the quality! Great for summer or fall.
I am a 12/14 and I sized up to xxl. I washed and dried them and they fit exactly how I wanted. Material is very thin and a little scratchy but I still love them.
Quality is cheap and see through. Probably can better and cheaper of SHEIN for better quality.

I have been on the hunt for these shorts that feel like nice quality. unfortunately i followed some reviews that said to size up. unless you want to look like you’re wearing a diaper… don’t do that! will be exchanging for a smaller size and more colors!

They are an easy throw on for running around the house, you won’t be embarrassed to answer the door if need be. They are fun and cute. I sized up so I can roll the top down and since I wear them to bed I like loose pjs.

Loves these shorts and great quality for the price. They fit true to size and are great for wearing around the house to as pajamas. The material is thick, but soft and has an elastic band, which I like because it keeps them up on my hips better.
These run very small. I would size up at least one size if not two. Very cute shorts!
Super cute but size up - waistband is tight! I ordered a large; in 5’5 145lbs.

Loved the look of these but they are very small and short. Would size up.
Received these and loved them. Washed them and shrunk 3 sizes. Can’t wear anymore
Comfy, true to size, cute, but see through. Decided to wear these to the beach, but wouldn’t out in public because of how transparent they are.

Run very small. So knowing this I ordered XL (I am normally a M) and they are loose and comfy for sleep and lounge. If I was to wear as street clothes I would have just sized up 1 size. They wash well and are soft:)
Really disappointed with the quality of the white boxers. The fabric is paper thin and sheer. Sizing runs small.

i usually wear a L/XL or 12/14 . i’m 5’5 200 lbs athletic build. i originally ordered the XL and the waist band was too tight for my liking and i was kinda muffin topping . so i ordered a 2XL to get a baggier fit and they’re both the same exact size.. and the 2XL feels thinner and lighter, almost see through. besides the waist there is no give to these pants.

Comfy and light to wear around the house or for errands! I just had a baby so the waist is sometimes snug but thinking once i lose the extra tummy fat they will fit perfect! Also it’s a thin fabric that’s slightly see through but this doesn’t bother me.
Cute but see through. The material is thin and feels very cheap.
The band is very thin and they run small! I would order 2 sizes up. Otherwise, I really liked the material!

The sizing is pretty accurate, comfy and cute I did wear black spandex underneath since a just slightly see through but not as much as I thought it would be, you could go without. I weight about 145 lb & I’m 5’5
These shorts are so comfortable. The waistband stays in place and doesn't roll or get twisted. They didn't shrink after you wash them and they get softer with each wash.
These are just not working out like I was hoping for. To big and look cheap

Wish i got a larger size for a looser fit but I wore these almost everyday of vacation definitely got my moneys worth

I ended up getting a Large after readi g some reviews and wish I would of gotten a Medium like I usually do. I sized up thinking they would be tight. The boxers are stretchy and very comfortable, I may buy a new pair in a different color a size smaller.
the waist is very stretchy so if you’re in between sizes, size to fit your thighs!
These run very small.  i recommend getting a sizer bigger than you think you need...maybe even two if you want your thighs not to eat them.
These are so stylish and comfortable. Reasonable quality for the price. They look like they are right off a Pinterest board!

These boxers are a little stiff for material which doesn’t make them super soft or comfortable, but they are very cute and fun to style. The waist elastic is tight but otherwise the boxers themselves are very roomy. I felt that the color and design were exactly as shown online. I would buy these again! I did choose to size up and I am glad I did. While my traditional size would have fit, they wouldn’t have been nearly as cute in a tighter size.
I ordered a size up and they were still too tight!  I’ve been thinking about ordering them in a larger size. Certainly not the best quality but would be nice for around the house.
Runs small. Size up

Best pair I’ve found yet. All the others I have ordered from different companies either fit too baggy or too tight around the hips. Perfect for the wide hip girlies.
Super cute for bedtime or, to wear out and dress up a little.

i am 5'9", size 8/10, 160 lbs and i ordered an XL and the waist fits comfortably and there is room in the leg. so basically size up at least 1 size. i got the red and white checkered pair and they look really cute with a white tee or tank. they aren't the best quality, but for the price point, i think they're great.
I sized up to get a looser fit based on other reviews and they are a perfect baggy fit! I love them!
These were very cheaply made, the fabric is flimsy, the tag isn't centered, and they are not true to size. Would recommend picking an alternative brand.
From throwing on to run errands or sleeping in, these are very comfy boxer shorts. I am 5'6" and 140pounds. I bought a size medium and love.

I got several pairs - green, red and purple. The green and red are the same material. But the purple one are more silky which I liked better! They are nice, but I think there’s petter quality. Still think they are descent for the price
Such a comfortable little pair of shorts to wear to bed or out for casual daytime shopping, lunch or errands! Love these!
i loved these but sadly shrunk in the wash and i followed the wash instructions on tag!

Love these!  FP dupe, very comfy and good fit!

going to be buying these in every color. so comfy, cute and lightweight. they look identical to the photos in person! i’m normally a medium but i sized up for a looser, more flowy fit through the legs. the waist has a lot of stretch so i don’t think you should have to worry if you’re in between sizes.

Runs very small I’m usually a medium but sized up for comfort just in case and I need to now size up probably two sizes it is so fitted. Might as well have ordered a kids size it was fitted all the way around and got close to spandex. I’m returning and buying a new size because I really want them and the style for the price is decent. They feel very comfortable if they fit properly but the material seems great for summer.
The sizing is inconsistent. I’m tired of reordering it just for the next size up to fit the exact same. Don’t even bother.

EDIT: I bought the green, pink and blue stripe. They are all the same length and waist band sizing seems consistent. I’ve been wearing them nonstop and really enjoy them! I could even size up to a large for an even flower fit, but medium works too.  I had low expectations as I’ve ordered other boxer shorts that were a complete fail. To my surprise, these were not too small/too tight and fit very comfortably. I’m 5’6” + 140lbs/size 4/6 pants/athletic build and sized up to medium. The waist band isn’t too tight and the leg holes have a bit of space. They are a nice cotton fabric that isn’t scratchy. I haven’t dried them yet, but they feel like they could shrink in the dryer. I reordered in two other colors to see if those are just as good. Super cute, super comfy, I’d definitely recommend for the price!
Super super cheap material, thin and kind of hard. Returned these and 2 other colors I ordered also. Also had kind of a weird shape to them that I didn't like.
I was a little hesitant to buy these. I thought they were going to be very cheap material and see through but I was surprised. I’m 5’0 and 170 lbs I bought an xl.

Size 12, got an XL in this color and they fit loosely and comfortably.
Two sizes smaller than stated size. Wouldn’t recommend

These are so cute and comfy! I’m 5’0 & 112lbs and I usually wear a size xs/s but sized up to a medium and they were perfect. A little see through but if you wear tan underwear it’s fine. They are thin but I think that makes them perfect for the summer heat. I definitely need them in every color now!
didn’t love the quality, and ran small.

Not sure why it says the item runs large, but they run a little small. If in between sizes, size up. They have ZERO stretch and if you have thicker thighs, size up or pass all together. Very cheap, scratchy table cloth like material. They seem like they’d rip very easily

The fit is good, honestly better than I expected. But size up for a looser fit! The waistband is very stretchy so allowed for a bigger size. The material is as expected though - reflects the inexpensive price and is a bit scratchy (unlined). This wasn’t an issue for me though!
Fits great and comfortable
Orange looks brown not same as advertised photo
The sizing is generous go for size down if you don’t want them so loose. Others need to fold down waist. Other than that great quality. My teenager loves them.
I was worried about sizing after reading reviews but I ordered a small they fit true to size, a slight oversized fit.
Exactly as pictured, definitely size up.
Ordered my usual size and I would size up at least one size for a relaxed fit
I ordered the red checkered pair of shorts and they came as a hot pink colour. Very thin material as well, but not bad for the price.
Returning asap. Just purchased and for reference I'm a size 6-8 (M). I bought a xl hoping it would be baggy. Its super bad quality and fits super tight:(

I ordered two different colours of (what I thought) would be the same shorts. The red ones were perfect, exactly what I was looking for and exactly as described! (Although you should definitely size up). HOWEVER, the blue ones were made from a completely different (cheap) material, significantly smaller, and didn't even have pockets. Super disappointed as they would have been perfect if both were made the same way but not going to risk ordering a different style because you don't really know what you're going to get.
They look exactly the same as the photos and they fit perfectly! True to size.
